changeSet.author: Borovik
changeSet.sql: create table if not exists transactions( id bigserial PRIMARY KEY, transaction_number varchar(150) not null, transaction_type varchar(50) not null, transaction_amount decimal(15,3) not null CHECK (transaction_amount >= 0.01), transaction_time timestamp not null, sender_account_id bigint not null, beneficiary_account_id bigint not null, foreign key (sender_account_id) references account (id), foreign key (beneficiary_account_id) references account (id) )
